title: Disjoint Events: Rolling a Fair Die
question_text:
Suppose a fair die is rolled once.
Which of the following events are disjoint?

choices.text:
The die is prime; the die is a
2
.
The die is even; the die is odd.

The die is greater than
4
; the die is
5
.

The die is at least
4
; the die is less than
5
.
The die is prime; the die is even.
